data.actual_result: Text box falls down, and then rises up
data.expected_result: Text box rises up as the predictive text box is shown
data.short_description: Removing the mention/emoji suggestion drawer on a line break causes the text box to dip down before coming up (Must have predictive text turned on)
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a sentence to get to a line break - Open either the mention suggestion drawer or the emoji suggestion drawer - Close the suggestion drawer, making sure it temoves the like break, and observe the animation of the text box - If this doesn’t happen the first time, try again multiple times using the same steps as before
